source.query:
TRUNCATE TABLE f_pln_dryarea;
INSERT INTO f_pln_dryarea
WITH PRE_STAGGING AS(

    select

        DATE(O_PLN_DRYAREA_RAW.upload_time) AS Upload_Date,

        O_PLN_DRYAREA_RAW.project_id,

        O_PLN_DRYAREA_RAW.tower,

        O_PLN_DRYAREA_RAW.`Level`,

        O_PLN_DRYAREA_RAW.Flat,

        'Dry Area' AS sclicer,

        Column_Name.*,

        O_PLN_DRYAREA_MAP.ACTIVITY_ID,

        O_PLN_DRYAREA_MAP.SBU_ID,

        O_PLN_DRYAREA_MAP.Category,

        DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY  project_id

                            ORDER BY  DATE(upload_time) DESC

                            )    AS Project_Udate_DRANK

    from O_PLN_DRYAREA_RAW

    cross join lateral (

            SELECT     `HSE Clearance for Deshuttering`              ,               'HSE Clearance for Deshuttering'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP Riser Works`           ,               'MEP Riser Works'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `LPG Pipe`           ,               'LPG Pipe'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Blockwork Layout Marking`        ,               'Blockwork Layout Marking'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Blockwork First Layer`   ,               'Blockwork First Layer'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Blockwork with 1mtr marking`  ,               'Blockwork with 1mtr marking'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `GI Lintel`             ,               'GI Lintel'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `RCC Lintel / Stiffener`   ,               'RCC Lintel / Stiffener'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Above Lintel Block Work`             ,               'Above Lintel Block Work'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Head Restraints Installation`      ,               'Head Restraints Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Fire Sealant Works & PU Foam Works`  ,               'Fire Sealant Works & PU Foam Works'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP Marking for HL Builders Work`        ,               'MEP Marking for HL Builders Work'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Blockwork Cutting for MEP Services`      ,               'Blockwork Cutting for MEP Services'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP Wall Marking for Cutting & Chasing`             ,               'MEP Wall Marking for Cutting & Chasing'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Bull Marking for Plaster`              ,               'Bull Marking for Plaster'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Sub Frame`        ,               'Sub Frame'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Corner Bead Fixing`        ,               'Corner Bead Fixing'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Cutting & Chasing`          ,               'Cutting & Chasing'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP Plastering Clearance (Box fixing & Pipe setting)`      ,                'MEP Plastering Clearance (Box fixing & Pipe setting)'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `ONU, DB & All MEP works Installation`  ,               'ONU, DB & All MEP works Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `ONU, DB & All MEP works Packing`         ,               'ONU, DB & All MEP works Packing'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Dry Area Plaster`             ,               'Dry Area Plaster'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Plastering Clearance with 1 Meter Marking`        ,                'Plastering Clearance with 1 Meter Marking'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Center line marking for Facade Installation`         ,                'Center line marking for Facade Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `UCW-Starter Gutter`     ,               'UCW-Starter Gutter'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `UCW-Brackets` ,               'UCW-Brackets'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `UCW-Panels`    ,               'UCW-Panels'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `UCW-Alignment`            ,               'UCW-Alignment'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Dry Area Tile Marking`  ,               'Dry Area Tile Marking'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Dry Area Bore Packing` ,               'Dry Area Bore Packing'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Dry Area Screed`             ,               'Dry Area Screed'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Screed Curing`  ,               'Screed Curing'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Primer,Stucco banding` ,               'Primer,Stucco banding'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Bulk Head`         ,               'Bulk Head'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP H/L Wiring`              ,               'MEP H/L Wiring'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP H/L Framing Clearance`      ,               'MEP H/L Framing Clearance'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Fire Sealant works around ducts`             ,               'Fire Sealant works around ducts'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Dry Area FC Framing`    ,               'Dry Area FC Framing'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Wardrobe Nib wall`        ,               'Wardrobe Nib wall'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP H/L Boarding Clearance`    ,               'MEP H/L Boarding Clearance'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `FC Boarding with Joint Taping`  ,               'FC Boarding with Joint Taping'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Primer Ceiling` ,               'Primer Ceiling'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Stucco 1st Coat Ceiling` ,               'Stucco 1st Coat Ceiling'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Stucco 2nd Coat Ceiling`               ,               'Stucco 2nd Coat Ceiling'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `First Coat Paint Ceiling` ,               'First Coat Paint Ceiling'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Main Door Threshold`   ,               'Main Door Threshold'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Dry Area Floor Tiling`     ,               'Dry Area Floor Tiling'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Dry Area Skirting`            ,               'Dry Area Skirting'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `POP Above Skirting`       ,               'POP Above Skirting'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Hinge Door Box Installation`       ,               'Hinge Door Box Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Screed near Hinge Door`              ,               'Screed near Hinge Door'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Hinge Door Frame Installation`  ,               'Hinge Door Frame Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Curtain Wall Box Section`            ,               'Curtain Wall Box Section'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Curtain Wall Frame Installation`               ,               'Curtain Wall Frame Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Curtain Wall Glass Installation`  ,               'Curtain Wall Glass Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `UCW-GI Sheet Installation - Wall`             ,               'UCW-GI Sheet Installation - Wall'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `UCW-GI Sheet Installation - Floor`            ,               'UCW-GI Sheet Installation - Floor'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Screed near Curtain Wall`            ,               'Screed near Curtain Wall'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Sliding Door Box Installation`     ,               'Sliding Door Box Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Sliding Door Frame Installation`                ,               'Sliding Door Frame Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Screed near Sliding Door`            ,               'Screed near Sliding Door'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Left Over Tile Installation`           ,               'Left Over Tile Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Left Over Skirting`           ,               'Left Over Skirting'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Tile Grouting`   ,               'Tile Grouting'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Tile Silicone Works`        ,               'Tile Silicone Works'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Curtain Wall Mullion`    ,               'Curtain Wall Mullion'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Curtain Wall Flashing Installation`            ,               'Curtain Wall Flashing Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Curtain Wall Silicone`    ,               'Curtain Wall Silicone'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `UCW-Firestop and Silicone`        ,               'UCW-Firestop and Silicone'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `UCW-GI Flashing`            ,               'UCW-GI Flashing'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Hinge Door Glass Installation`    ,               'Hinge Door Glass Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Hinge Door Internal Silicone`      ,               'Hinge Door Internal Silicone'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Hinge Door Alignment` ,               'Hinge Door Alignment'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Hinge Door External Silicone`     ,               'Hinge Door External Silicone'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Sliding Door Glass Installation`  ,               'Sliding Door Glass Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Sliding Door Internal Silicone`    ,               'Sliding Door Internal Silicone'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Sliding Door Alignment`               ,               'Sliding Door Alignment'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Sliding Door External Silicone`   ,               'Sliding Door External Silicone'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Window Jamb,Corner,Pelmet Area, Shadow Angle POP Works`  ,               'Window Jamb,Corner,Pelmet Area, Shadow Angle POP Works'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Wall Stucco 1st Coat`    ,               'Wall Stucco 1st Coat'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Wall stucco 2nd coat`    ,               'Wall stucco 2nd coat'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Wall Paint 1st Coat`       ,               'Wall Paint 1st Coat'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Door - Frame Installation`            ,               'Door - Frame Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Door - Architrave Installation`    ,               'Door - Architrave Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Door - Shutter Installation`         ,               'Door - Shutter Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Door - Ironmongery Installation`              ,               'Door - Ironmongery Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Door - Silicone Works`  ,               'Door - Silicone Works'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Cut piece Skirting near Door`     ,               'Cut piece Skirting near Door'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Gas Meter Installation` ,               'Gas Meter Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP Kitchen Appliances`             ,               'MEP Kitchen Appliances'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Wardrobe Carcass Installation`  ,               'Wardrobe Carcass Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Wardrobe Shutter Installation`  ,               'Wardrobe Shutter Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Wardrobe Silicone Works`          ,               'Wardrobe Silicone Works'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Cut piece Skirting near Wardrobe`           ,               'Cut piece Skirting near Wardrobe'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Air Balancing for FCU`   ,               'Air Balancing for FCU'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `FCU Closure Clearance` ,               'FCU Closure Clearance'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `VCD Closure - FCU`         ,               'VCD Closure - FCU'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Air Balancing for FAHU`                ,               'Air Balancing for FAHU'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `FAHU Closure Clearance`             ,               'FAHU Closure Clearance'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `VCD Closure - FAHU`     ,               'VCD Closure - FAHU'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Final Fixtures Installation`           ,               'Final Fixtures Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Access Panel Final Coat and Installation`               ,                'Access Panel Final Coat and Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Dry Area Final Coat Preparation`              ,               'Dry Area Final Coat Preparation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Dry Area Final Coat Paint`            ,               'Dry Area Final Coat Paint'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Thermostat Cover Installation`  ,               'Thermostat Cover Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Intercom Cover Installation`       ,               'Intercom Cover Installation'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `ONU & DB Panel Door` ,               'ONU & DB Panel Door'

                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Switch socket cover Installation`               ,               'Switch socket cover Installation'

                                                                )

        as Column_Name(value,Type_of_work)

    JOIN O_PLN_DRYAREA_MAP

    ON Column_Name.Type_of_work = O_PLN_DRYAREA_MAP.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE

    WHERE value IS NOT NULL )

SELECT

    PS.Upload_Date   ,

    PS.project_id    ,

    PS.tower    ,

    PS.`Level`    ,

   PS.Flat    ,

    PS.sclicer    ,

    CASE

        WHEN PS.value IN ('','NA','-') THEN '0%'

        ELSE PS.value

    END AS value,

    PS.Type_of_work    ,

    PS.ACTIVITY_ID    ,

    PS.SBU_ID    ,

    PS.Category    ,

    OLMA.level_map

FROM PRE_STAGGING PS

    LEFT JOIN O_LEVEL_MAP_ALL OLMA

        ON PS.`Level` = OLMA.`level` WHERE Project_Udate_DRANK = 1;

        /**/

        SELECT 1;

TRUNCATE TABLE f_pln_kitchenarea;
INSERT INTO f_pln_kitchenarea
WITH PRE_STAGGING AS(

    SELECT

        DATE(O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_RAW.upload_time) AS Upload_Date,

        O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_RAW.project_id,

        O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_RAW.tower,

        O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_RAW.`Level`,

        O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_RAW.Flat,

        'Kitchen Area' AS sclicer,

        Column_Name.*,

        O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_MAP.ACTIVITY_ID,

        O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_MAP.SBU_ID,

        O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_MAP.Category,

        DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY  project_id

                            ORDER BY  DATE(upload_time) DESC

                            )   AS  Project_Udate_DRANK

    from O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_RAW

    cross join lateral (

            SELECT     `Kitchen Area Plaster`     ,               'Kitchen Area Plaster'

                                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Kitchen / Utility Framing Clearance`        ,                'Kitchen / Utility Framing Clearance'

                                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Kitchen / Utility Framing`             ,               'Kitchen / Utility Framing'

                                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Kitchen / Utility Boarding Clearance`      ,                'Kitchen / Utility Boarding Clearance'

                                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Kitchen / Utility Boarding`           ,               'Kitchen / Utility Boarding'

                                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Kitchen Wall Tile`            ,               'Kitchen Wall Tile'

                                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP Box Fixing`               ,               'MEP Box Fixing'

                                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Kitchen Cabinet`             ,               'Kitchen Cabinet'

                                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Kitchen Counter Plywood`          ,               'Kitchen Counter Plywood'

                                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Kitchen Counter Top`    ,               'Kitchen Counter Top'

                                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Kitchen Counter Top Skirting`    ,               'Kitchen Counter Top Skirting'

                                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Kitchen Cabinet Grouting`           ,               'Kitchen Cabinet Grouting'

                                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Kitchen Cabinet Silicone`             ,               'Kitchen Cabinet Silicone'

                                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP Fixtures for Kitchen Cabinet`            ,               'MEP Fixtures for Kitchen Cabinet'

                                                                                UNION ALL SELECT           `Kitchen Appliances`       ,               'Kitchen Appliances'

                                                                                )

        as Column_Name(value,Type_of_work)

    JOIN O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_MAP

    ON Column_Name.Type_of_work = O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_MAP.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE

    WHERE value IS NOT NULL)

SELECT

    PS.Upload_Date    ,

    PS.project_id    ,

    PS.tower    ,

    PS.`Level`    ,

    PS.Flat    ,

    PS.sclicer    ,

    CASE

        WHEN PS.value IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'

        ELSE PS.value

    END AS value,

    PS.Type_of_work    ,

    PS.ACTIVITY_ID    ,

    PS.SBU_ID    ,

    PS.Category    ,

    OLMA.level_map

FROM PRE_STAGGING PS

    LEFT JOIN O_LEVEL_MAP_ALL OLMA

        ON PS.`Level` = OLMA.`level`

WHERE Project_Udate_DRANK = 1;

 /**/
 Select 1;

TRUNCATE TABLE f_pln_wetarea;
INSERT INTO f_pln_wetarea
WITH PRE_STAGGING AS (

    SELECT

        DATE(O_PLN_WETAREA_RAW.upload_time) AS Upload_Date,

        O_PLN_WETAREA_RAW.project_id,

        O_PLN_WETAREA_RAW.tower,

        O_PLN_WETAREA_RAW.`Level`,

        O_PLN_WETAREA_RAW.Flat,

        'Wet Area' AS sclicer,

        Column_Name.*,

        O_PLN_WETAREA_MAP.ACTIVITY_ID,

        O_PLN_WETAREA_MAP.SBU_ID,

        O_PLN_WETAREA_MAP.Category,

        DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY  project_id

                                ORDER BY  DATE(upload_time) DESC

                                )   AS  Project_Udate_DRANK

    from O_PLN_WETAREA_RAW

    cross join lateral (

                SELECT `Plastering Clearance with 1 Mtr Marking`             ,               'Plastering Clearance with 1 Mtr Marking'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Wet Area Tile Marking` ,               'Wet Area Tile Marking'

UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP Marking`  ,               'MEP Marking'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Wet Area Cutting & Chasing`      ,               'Wet Area Cutting & Chasing'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Pex pipe installation`     ,               'Pex pipe installation'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Re packing of MEP Services`       ,               'Re packing of MEP Services'

UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP Pipe installation - Borepacking`      ,               'MEP Pipe installation - Borepacking'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Wet Area Bore Packing`               ,               'Wet Area Bore Packing'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Cistern installation`        ,               'Cistern installation'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Drywall framing`             ,               'Drywall framing'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Pex Elbow & Connections`          ,               'Pex Elbow & Connections'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Bottom Boarding Clearance`      ,               'Bottom Boarding Clearance'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Bottom boarding`           ,               'Bottom boarding'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Under Screed Waterproofing`   ,               'Under Screed Waterproofing'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Wet Area Screed`           ,               'Wet Area Screed'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Ledge Wall Full Board Closure Clearance`             ,               'Ledge Wall Full Board Closure Clearance'

UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP HL Water Supply & Drainage`          ,               'MEP HL Water Supply & Drainage '

UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP HL Ducting & FCU Works`  ,               'MEP HL Ducting & FCU Works '

UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP HL Electrical Services Installation`  ,               'MEP HL Electrical Services Installation'

UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP HL Works & Testing`            ,               'MEP HL Works & Testing'

UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP HL Packing Clearance`         ,               'MEP HL Packing Clearance'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Packing for all builders work opening`   ,               'Packing for all builders work opening '

UNION ALL SELECT           `Wet Area MEP H/L Fire Sealent & Framing Clearance`     ,               'Wet Area MEP H/L Fire Sealent & Framing Clearance '

UNION ALL SELECT           `Wet area Wall Tile`         ,               'Wet area Wall Tile'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Wet Area FC Framing`   ,               'Wet Area FC Framing'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Wet Area MEP H/L Boarding Clearance` ,               'Wet Area MEP H/L Boarding Clearance'

UNION ALL SELECT           `FC Boarding & Joint Taping`        ,               'FC Boarding & Joint Taping'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Ceiling Paint Primer`      ,               'Ceiling Paint Primer'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Ceiling Paint Stucco 1st Coat & 2nd Coat`             ,               'Ceiling Paint Stucco 1st Coat & 2nd Coat'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Wet Area Ceiling First Coat Paint`            ,               'Wet Area Ceiling First Coat Paint'

UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP Grill & Diffuser Installtion` ,               'MEP Grill & Diffuser Installtion '

UNION ALL SELECT           `Shower Threshold`         ,               'Shower Threshold'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Linear Drain Supply`      ,               'Linear Drain Supply'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Linear Drain Fixing`        ,               'Linear Drain Fixing '

UNION ALL SELECT           `Under Tile Waterproofing`         ,               'Under Tile Waterproofing'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Bathroom Door Threshold`         ,               'Bathroom Door Threshold'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Wet Area Floor Tile`       ,               'Wet Area Floor Tile'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Wall tile bottom Tile`     ,               'Wall tile bottom Tile'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Grouting - Wall & Floor`               ,               'Grouting - Wall & Floor'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Silicone - Wall & Floor Corners` ,               'Silicone - Wall & Floor Corners'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Shower Partition - U channel`    ,               'Shower Partition - U channel'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Shower Partition - Glass`             ,               'Shower Partition - Glass'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Accessories & Silicon`    ,               'Accessories & Silicon'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Bathroom Door - Frame Installation`      ,               'Bathroom Door - Frame Installation'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Bathroom Door - Architrave Installation`              ,               'Bathroom Door - Architrave Installation'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Bathroom Door - Shutter Installation`    ,               'Bathroom Door - Shutter Installation'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Bathroom Door - Ironmongery Installation`         ,               'Bathroom Door - Ironmongery Installation'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Vanity Cabinet` ,               'Vanity Cabinet'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Vanity Cabinet Counter top`       ,               'Vanity Cabinet Counter top'

UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP Final Fixtures (Sanitary ,CP fittings & Lights,WB)`    ,               'MEP Final Fixtures (Sanitary ,CP fittings & Lights,WB)'

UNION ALL SELECT           `MEP Ledge Wall Clearance`        ,               'MEP Ledge Wall Clearance '

UNION ALL SELECT           `Ledge Wall Closing`        ,               'Ledge Wall Closing'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Silicone around MEP Fixtures`   ,               'Silicone around MEP Fixtures'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Wet Area Final Coat paint`          ,               'Wet Area Final Coat paint'

 

            )

              as Column_Name(value,Type_of_work)

        JOIN O_PLN_WETAREA_MAP

        ON Column_Name.Type_of_work = O_PLN_WETAREA_MAP.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE

        WHERE value IS NOT NULL)

SELECT

    PS.Upload_Date    ,

    PS.project_id    ,

    PS.tower    ,

    PS.`Level`    ,

    PS.Flat    ,

    PS.sclicer    ,

    CASE

        WHEN PS.value IN ('','NA','-') THEN '0%'

        ELSE PS.value

    END AS value,

    PS.Type_of_work    ,

    PS.ACTIVITY_ID    ,

    PS.SBU_ID    ,

    PS.Category    ,

    OLMA.level_map

FROM PRE_STAGGING PS

    LEFT JOIN O_LEVEL_MAP_ALL OLMA

        ON PS.`Level` = OLMA.`level`

WHERE Project_Udate_DRANK = 1;

/**/

SELECT 1;

TRUNCATE TABLE f_pln_balconyarea;
INSERT INTO f_pln_balconyarea
WITH PRE_STAGGING AS (

    SELECT DATE(O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_RAW.upload_time) AS Upload_Date,

        O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_RAW.project_id,

        O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_RAW.tower,

        O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_RAW.`Level`,

        O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_RAW.Flat,

        'Balcony Area' AS sclicer,

        Column_Name.*,

        O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_MAP.ACTIVITY_ID,

        O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_MAP.SBU_ID,

        O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_MAP.Category,

        DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY  project_id

                            ORDER BY  DATE(upload_time) DESC

                            ) AS Project_Udate_DRANK

    from O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_RAW

    cross join lateral (

                SELECT `Marking for Rain Water Pipe`    ,               'Marking for Rain Water Pipe'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Rain water pipe`              ,               'Rain water pipe'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Rain Water Pipe Packing`             ,               'Rain Water Pipe Packing'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Balcony Blockwork`        ,               'Balcony Blockwork'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Balcony Plaster`               ,               'Balcony Plaster'

UNION ALL SELECT           `F channel Installation`   ,               'F channel Installation'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Non Shrink Grout`          ,               'Non Shrink Grout'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Top Rail Bracket Installation`      ,               'Top Rail Bracket Installation'

UNION ALL SELECT           `EIFS Installation`              ,               'EIFS Installation'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Balcony EIFS Plaster`     ,               'Balcony EIFS Plaster'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Grinding Clearance`       ,               'Grinding Clearance'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Ceiling Skim Coat & Primer`        ,               'Ceiling Skim Coat & Primer'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Balcony Screed`               ,               'Balcony Screed'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Drain Fixing`      ,               'Drain Fixing'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Ceiling Balcony Box Installation`               ,               'Ceiling Balcony Box Installation'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Left Over Screed (If any)`             ,               'Left Over Screed (If any)'

UNION ALL SELECT           `EIFS Wall Texture`          ,               'EIFS Wall Texture'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Balustrade Glass Installation`     ,               'Balustrade Glass Installation'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Balustrade Top Rail`       ,               'Balustrade Top Rail'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Balcony Under Tile Water Proofing`        ,               'Balcony Under Tile Water Proofing'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Balcony Floor Tiling`       ,               'Balcony Floor Tiling'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Balustrade - Internal Flashing`   ,               'Balustrade - Internal Flashing'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Balcony Skirting`              ,               'Balcony Skirting'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Metal Ceiling`   ,               'Metal Ceiling'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Balcony Ceiling Texture`              ,               'Balcony Ceiling Texture'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Complete Wall Texture`               ,               'Complete Wall Texture'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Balcony Grouting`           ,               'Balcony Grouting'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Balcony Silicone`             ,               'Balcony Silicone'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Balcony MEP Final Fixtures`       ,               'Balcony MEP Final Fixtures'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Balcony Final Coat Paint`             ,               'Balcony Final Coat Paint'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Balcony Drain Cover Supply`      ,               'Balcony Drain Cover Supply'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Cover fixing for balcony drain`   ,               'Cover fixing for balcony drain'

UNION ALL SELECT           `Cover plate B/W ACP & EIFS`     ,               'Cover plate B/W ACP & EIFS'

 

        )

        as Column_Name(value,Type_of_work)

    JOIN O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_MAP

    ON Column_Name.Type_of_work = O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_MAP.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE

    WHERE value IS NOT NULL

    AND value !='')

SELECT

    PS.Upload_Date    ,

    PS.project_id    ,

    PS.tower    ,

    PS.`Level`    ,

    PS.Flat    ,

    PS.sclicer    ,

    CASE

        WHEN PS.value IN ('','NA','-') THEN '0%'

        ELSE PS.value

    END AS value,

    PS.Type_of_work    ,

    PS.ACTIVITY_ID    ,

    PS.SBU_ID    ,

    PS.Category    ,

    OLMA.level_map

FROM PRE_STAGGING PS

    LEFT JOIN O_LEVEL_MAP_ALL OLMA

        ON PS.`Level` = OLMA.`level`

WHERE Project_Udate_DRANK = 1;

/**/

SELECT 1;

TRUNCATE TABLE f_pln_flatfinishes;
INSERT INTO f_pln_flatfinishes
WITH UNION_ALL AS (
        SELECT * FROM F_PLN_DRYAREA
            UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM F_PLN_WETAREA
            UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM F_PLN_BALCONYAREA
            UNION ALL
        SELECT * FROM F_PLN_KITCHENAREA
                ),
    UNION_CLEAN AS (
        SELECT 
        UA.Upload_Date,
            UA.project_id,
            UA.tower,
            UA.`Level`,
            UA.Flat,
            UA.sclicer,
            CASE 
                WHEN UA.value IN ('','NA','TBC','-','#N/A') THEN '0%'
                ELSE UA.value
            END AS value,
            UA.Type_of_work,
            UA.ACTIVITY_ID,
            UA.SBU_ID,
            UA.Category,
            CONCAT(UA.ACTIVITY_ID,' ', UA.Type_of_work) AS sort_type_of_work 
        FROM 
        UNION_ALL UA),
    STAGGING AS (
        SELECT
            UA.Upload_Date,
            UA.project_id,
            UA.tower,
            UA.`Level`,
            UA.Flat,
            UA.sclicer,
            CAST(REPLACE(UA.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL)/100 AS value,
            UA.Type_of_work,
            UA.ACTIVITY_ID,
            UA.SBU_ID,
            UA.Category,
            OLMA.level_map,
            CONCAT(UA.ACTIVITY_ID,' ', UA.Type_of_work) AS sort_type_of_work
        FROM UNION_CLEAN UA
            LEFT JOIN O_LEVEL_MAP_ALL OLMA ON UA.`Level` = OLMA.`level`
        WHERE LENGTH(value) <= 4)
    SELECT
        *,
        CASE WHEN sclicer = 'Dry Area' THEN 1
            WHEN sclicer = 'Wet Area' THEN 2
            WHEN sclicer = 'Kitchen Area' THEN 3
           WHEN sclicer = 'Balcony Area' THEN 4
        END AS Sort_Slicer,
        CASE 
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('MEP')    THEN    1
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Blockwork')    THEN    2
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Plaster')    THEN    3
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Builders Work')    THEN    4
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Facade')    THEN    5
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Tile')    THEN    6
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Screed')    THEN    7
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Paint')    THEN    8
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Gypsum')    THEN    9
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Marble')    THEN    10
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Silicone')    THEN    11
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Joinery')    THEN    12
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('SBU1')    THEN    13
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Waterproofing')    THEN    14
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Faï¿½ade')    THEN    15
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('EIFS')    THEN    16
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('SFD')    THEN    17
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Water Proofing')    THEN    18
            WHEN    TRIM(Category) =     ('Appliances')    THEN    19
        END AS Category_Sort        
    FROM STAGGING
    ORDER BY value;

    /**/

    SELECT 1;
